title: Heart of a city
creator_credit: Ajax Films, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Brian Chirlian and Ralph W Peterson
brief_description: Documentary about Queensland’s capital city, Brisbane: the people, cultural events, city and environs. The role of government departments in the city including local government, council planners and Brisbane City Council. Cinematographer/Director of Photography: Keith Loone.
creator_credit_for_label: Ajax Films, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Brian Chirlian and Ralph W Peterson
